content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 5, Mallorca 2.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 5, Mallorca 2.
Goal!  Real Madrid 5, Mallorca 2. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gonzalo Higuaín.
Attempt blocked. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Alejandro Alfaro.
Attempt saved. Giovani dos Santos (Mallorca) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alejandro Alfaro.
Attempt missed. Pepe (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Luka Modric following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Dudu Aouate.
Attempt saved. Gonzalo Higuaín (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Substitution, Mallorca. Andreu Fontàs replaces Fernando Tissone.
